description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚中南半岛东端的社会主义国家，由越南共产党一党专政。
description.en: A socialist state at the eastern edge of the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia, under the single-party rule of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南唯一的执政党，对越南行政、立法、司法各个部门的机构直接掌控。
description.en: The sole ruling party of Vietnam, directly controlling the executive, legislative, and judicial branches of government.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越南共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越南社会主义共和国主席。
description.en: Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the President of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越南政府总理。
description.en: Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the Prime Minister of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越南国会主席。
description.en: Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the National Assembly of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越共中央书记处常务书记。
description.en: Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the Permanent Member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南革命家，越南民主共和国的创立者。
description.en: Vietnamese revolutionary and the founder of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 由胡志明等人创办的越南革命组织，旨在反对法国和日本的殖民统治。
description.en: A Vietnamese revolutionary organization founded by Hồ Chí Minh and others to oppose French and Japanese colonial rule.

description.zh-cn: 由越南独立同盟会发动的起义，旨在夺取越南政权并宣布独立。
description.en: An uprising launched by the Viet Minh to seize power in Vietnam and declare independence.

description.zh-cn: 1945年由胡志明宣布成立的国家，通常被称为北越。
description.en: A state proclaimed by Hồ Chí Minh in 1945, commonly known as North Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，曾在19世纪中后期至20世纪中期对越南进行殖民统治。
description.en: A European country that colonized Vietnam from the mid-19th to the mid-20th century.

description.zh-cn: 越南独立同盟会为反抗法国重新殖民统治而进行的战争。
description.en: A war fought by the Viet Minh against the re-colonization efforts of France.

description.zh-cn: 第一次印度支那战争中的决定性战役，越南民主共和国军队在此击败法军。
description.en: The decisive battle of the First Indochina War, where the forces of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam defeated the French.

description.zh-cn: 旨在解决朝鲜半岛和印度支那问题的国际会议，会议决定以北纬17度线为界暂时分割越南。
description.en: An international conference to resolve issues in the Korean Peninsula and Indochina, which decided to temporarily partition Vietnam at the 17th parallel.

description.zh-cn: 根据1954年日内瓦会议的规定，越南被暂时分为北越（越南民主共和国）和南越（越南国）。
description.en: According to the 1954 Geneva Accords, Vietnam was temporarily divided into North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam) and South Vietnam (State of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 1955年由吴廷琰建立的国家，通常被称为南越，在越南战争中与北越对峙。
description.en: A state established by Ngô Đình Diệm in 1955, commonly known as South Vietnam, which opposed North Vietnam during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 发生在越南民主共和国（北越）与越南共和国（南越）及其盟友之间的长期战争。
description.en: A prolonged war fought between the Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam) and the Republic of Vietnam (South Vietnam) and their respective allies.

description.zh-cn: 前共产主义国家，在越南战争期间支持北越。
description.en: A former communist state that supported North Vietnam during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲国家，在越南战争期间支持北越，后因边境及柬埔寨问题与越南发生战争。
description.en: An Asian country that supported North Vietnam during the Vietnam War, and later engaged in a war with Vietnam over border and Cambodian issues.

description.zh-cn: 北美国家，在越南战争期间支持南越。
description.en: A North American country that supported South Vietnam during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 指标志着越南战争结束的北越军队攻陷南越首都西贡事件，该事件直接促成了越南的统一。
description.en: Refers to the event where North Vietnamese forces captured Saigon, the capital of South Vietnam, marking the end of the Vietnam War and leading directly to the reunification of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党于1986年开始推行的经济改革政策，旨在建立社会主义市场经济。
description.en: An economic reform policy initiated by the Communist Party of Vietnam in 1986, aimed at establishing a socialist-oriented market economy.

description.zh-cn: 越南入侵柬埔寨并推翻红色高棉政权的战争。
description.en: A war in which Vietnam invaded Cambodia and overthrew the Khmer Rouge regime.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨共产主义政权，后被越南军队推翻。
description.en: A communist regime in Cambodia, which was later overthrown by the Vietnamese army.

description.zh-cn: 因越南入侵柬埔寨及边境争端，中华人民共和国与越南社会主义共和国之间爆发的短暂战争。
description.en: A brief war between the People's Republic of China and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, sparked by Vietnam's invasion of Cambodia and border disputes.

description.zh-cn: 全球性的政府间国际组织。
description.en: A global intergovernmental organization.

description.zh-cn: 处理国家之间贸易规则的全球性国际组织。
description.en: A global international organization dealing with the rules of trade between nations.

description.en: The highest leadership position of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国的政府首脑。
description.en: The head of government of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南国会的领导人。
description.en: The leader of the National Assembly of Vietnam.

nodes.id: 越南共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 越南共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党的中央机构之一，负责处理日常党务。
description.en: One of the central bodies of the Communist Party of Vietnam, responsible for handling daily party affairs.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党是越南唯一的执政党，对国家实行全面领导。
description.en: The Communist Party of Vietnam is the sole ruling party, exercising comprehensive leadership over the state.

description.zh-cn: 1941年，胡志明等越南革命家创办“越南独立同盟会”（简称越盟）。
description.en: In 1941, Vietnamese revolutionaries including Hồ Chí Minh founded the 'League for the Independence of Vietnam' (Viet Minh).

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月，越南独立同盟会发动八月革命宣布独立。
description.en: In August 1945, the Viet Minh launched the August Revolution to declare independence.

description.zh-cn: 八月革命后，胡志明于1945年9月2日宣告越南民主共和国成立。
description.en: After the August Revolution, Hồ Chí Minh proclaimed the establishment of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam on September 2, 1945.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，越南民主共和国在奠边府战役中大败法军，导致法国势力退出越南。
description.en: In 1954, the Democratic Republic of Vietnam decisively defeated the French forces at the Battle of Dien Bien Phu, leading to the withdrawal of French forces from Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1954年的日内瓦会议规定以北纬17度线为临时军事分界线，造成了越南的分裂。
description.en: The 1954 Geneva Conference stipulated the 17th parallel as a provisional military demarcation line, resulting in the partition of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，北越（越南民主共和国）与南越（越南共和国）处于敌对状态。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam) and South Vietnam (Republic of Vietnam) were in a state of hostility.

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，苏联向北越（越南民主共和国）提供军事和经济援助。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, the Soviet Union provided military and economic aid to North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，中华人民共和国向北越（越南民主共和国）提供支援。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, the People's Republic of China provided support to North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，美国向南越（越南共和国）提供主要支援。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, the United States was the primary supporter of South Vietnam (Republic of Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 1975年4月30日，北越军队攻陷南越首都西贡，越南共和国灭亡。
description.en: On April 30, 1975, North Vietnamese forces captured Saigon, the capital of South Vietnam, leading to the collapse of the Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 430事件结束了越南战争，并促成了次年南北越统一为越南社会主义共和国。
description.en: The Fall of Saigon ended the Vietnam War and led to the reunification of North and South Vietnam into the Socialist Republic of Vietnam the following year.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，越南共产党开始推行“革新开放”政策，向社会主义市场经济转型。
description.en: In 1986, the Communist Party of Vietnam began to implement the 'Đổi Mới' policy, transitioning to a socialist-oriented market economy.

description.zh-cn: 越南于1978年底入侵柬埔寨，推翻了红色高棉政权。
description.en: Vietnam invaded Cambodia in late 1978, overthrowing the Khmer Rouge regime.

description.zh-cn: 因越南入侵柬埔寨和边境争端，中越两国于1979年爆发了中越战争。
description.en: Due to Vietnam's invasion of Cambodia and border disputes, the Sino-Vietnamese War broke out between the two countries in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 越南于1995年7月与美国建立外交关系。
description.en: Vietnam established diplomatic relations with the United States in July 1995.
